SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_BY, to_char(to_date(CREATED,'yy-mm-dd hh:mi'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm') CREATED, VIEW_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE ACTIVE_FLG='Y' AND BOARD_MNG_NO = #{BOARD_MNG_NO} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.BOARD_MNG_NO, A.BOARD_NO, to_char(A.CREATED,'yy-mm-dd hh:mi') CREATED, A.CREATED_BY, A.VIEW_CNT, B.REPLY_FLG, A.QUESTION_TYPE_CD, A.FILE_CD FROM TB_BOARD A, TB_BOARD_MNG B WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} AND A.BOARD_MNG_NO = B.BOARD_MNG_NO

SELECT A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.BOARD_MNG_NO, A.BOARD_NO, A.CREATED, A.CREATED_BY, A.VIEW_CNT, B.REPLY_FLG, A.QUESTION_TYPE_CD, C.FILE_CD, C.FILE_NM FROM TB_BOARD A, TB_BOARD_MNG B, TB_FILE C WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} AND A.BOARD_MNG_NO = B.BOARD_MNG_NO AND A.FILE_CD = C.FILE_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_MNG_NO, FILE_CD, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CNT, QUESTION_TYPE_CD, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY) VALUES(board_seq.nextval, #{BOARD_MNG_NO},(SELECT FILE_CD FROM TB_FILE WHERE FILE_NM =#{FILE_NM} and CREATED = sysdate), #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, '0', ' ', #{CREATED_BY}, '')
mapper.select: SELECT A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.BOARD_MNG_NO, A.BOARD_NO, A.CREATED, A.VIEW_CNT, B.REPLY_FLG, A.QUESTION_TYPE_CD, C.FILE_NM, C.FILE_CD FROM TB_BOARD A, TB_BOARD_MNG B, TB_FILE C WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} AND A.BOARD_MNG_NO = B.BOARD_MNG_NO AND C.FILE_CD = A.FILE_CD

SELECT A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.BOARD_MNG_NO, A.BOARD_NO, A.CREATED, A.VIEW_CNT, B.REPLY_FLG, A.QUESTION_TYPE_CD, A.FILE_CD FROM TB_BOARD A, TB_BOARD_MNG B WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BOARD_NO} AND A.BOARD_MNG_NO = B.BOARD_MNG_NO
